definition: to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: And this from a man who, quite recently, could not trap a bag of suet.
sentences.chinese: 这都源于这个刚刚丢弃了板油包袱的男人。

sentences.english: Those people who had joint the group, they can erase their poster.
sentences.chinese: 那些后来组队了板油，可以将自己的信息更改。

sentences.english: The suet puddings and the red pillar-boxes have entered into your soul.
sentences.chinese: 板油布丁和红色邮筒已经深入你的灵魂。

sentences.english: Mechanisms concerning the genetics and heterosis of traits such as perirenal fat and others were discussed with caution.
sentences.chinese: 本文是探讨板油等性状的遗传与杂种优势的表现问题。

sentences.english: The lord of suet was not so bad as masters went.
sentences.chinese: 板油大王不像一般主人那么糟。

definition: cooking starch/pasty mixture of starch and water
